**Examples**

```esql
FROM books
| WHERE MATCH_PHRASE(author, "William Faulkner")
```

| book_no:keyword | author:text      |
|-----------------|------------------|
| 2713            | William Faulkner |
| 2883            | William Faulkner |

```esql
FROM books
| WHERE MATCH_PHRASE(title, "Hobbit There", {"slop": "5"})
| KEEP title;
```

| title:text                         |
|------------------------------------|
| The Hobbit or There and Back Again |
